author: Cyrus Todiwala
method: Put all the ingredients into a blender and whiz until you have got a thick paste, adding a little water if necessary.  Taste and adjust the seasoning, adding more lime juice if you like.
ingredients: 250g/9oz fresh grated coconut or frozen coconut, thawed ,  or 150g/5oz desiccated coconut,  1 large bunch of fresh coriander,  1 large bunch of fresh mint,  4-5 green chillies,  6-8 garlic cloves,  1 tsp (heaped) cumin seeds,  1 tbsp sugar,  1 large lime, juiced (or to taste),  salt
